channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [DERBY-5688] Track tasks needed to produce the 10.9.1 release
item.description: Master task to track the production of the 10.9.1 release.
item.summary: Track tasks needed to produce the 10.9.1 release

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: First rev of release notes checked in at subversion revision 1338866.
Attaching derby-5688-02-aa-bumpReleaseIDonTrunk.diff, bumping the release id on trunk to 10.10.0.0.
Attaching derby-5688-03-aa-statusAndReleaseNotes.diff. This updates the STATUS file and the release notes in the 10.9 branch. Committed at subversion revision 1342064.
Copied the generated error message file for the reference manual to the trunk from the 10.9 branch and committed it at revision 1342447.
Attaching derby-5688-04-aa-addBranchToWebsite.diff, which adds 10.9 to the list of branches on our website. Committed at subversion revision 1342683.
Attaching derby-5688-05-aa-changeVersionOnTrunk.diff, which bumps the version on the trunk to 10.10. Tests ran cleanly for me. Committed at subversion revision 1343384.
Attaching derby-5688-06-aa-releaseNotesRev2.diff, the rev of the release notes which will appear in the first release candidate. Committed at subversion revision 1344867.
Attaching derby-5688-07-aa-docsCopyrightYearAndReleaseID.diff, which bumps the copyright year and release id used by the docs build. Committed to trunk at subversion revision 1345980.
The copyright year and release id seem out of date in the 10.9 branch, too – should the fix be ported there too?

Thanks, Kim. Attaching derby-5688-08-aa-docsCopyrightYearAndReleaseID_10.9.diff, which makes corresponding changes to the 10.9 docs branch. The original patch could not be ported directly because it sets the version id to 10.10 rather than 10.9. Committed at subversion revision 1346007.
Attaching derby-5688-09-aa-docsCopyrightYear_10.8.diff, which bumps the copyright year on the 10.8 docs branch. Committed at subversion revision 1346010.

Attaching derby-5688-10-aa-moreFilesInSourceDistro.diff. Kristian noticed that some files were missing from our source distributions.

After applying this patch, the source distributions include some more files:

releaseSummary.xml
tools/l10n
tools/l10n/build.xml
tools/l10n/LocCompare.java
tools/l10n/README
tools/release/jirasoap

tools/release/jirasoap/src/main/java/org/apache/derbyBuild/jirasoap/DerbyVersion.java
tools/release/jirasoap/src/main/java/org/apache/derbyBuild/jirasoap/FilteredIssueLister.java
tools/release/jirasoap/src/main/java/org/apache/derbyBuild/jirasoap/FilteredIssueListerAntWrapper.java

tools/release/templates/releaseSummaryTemplate.xml

Touches the following file:

M tools/release/build.xml

Committed to trunk at subversion revision 1346054.

Ported to 10.9 branch at subversion revision 1346060.

Ported to 10.8 branch at subversion revision 1346062.

Attaching derby-5688-11-aa-removeEclipsePluginsFromDownloadPage.diff. This patch removes the Eclipse plugins from the boilerplate which is inserted into the release notes by the transformrelnotes ant target.

Committed to trunk at subversion revision 1352913.

Ported to 10.9 branch at subversion revision 1352915.

Ported to 10.8 branch at subversion revision 1352917.

Touches the following file:

M java/build/org/apache/derbyBuild/ReleaseNotesTransformer.java

Attaching derby-5688-12-aa-websiteUpdates.diff. This patch adds 10.9.1.0 to the Derby website. Committed at subversion revision 1352943.

Along the way, I made other website changes:

o Updated the website skin's copyright year from 2011 to 2012.

o Removed some footers on pages which asserted when the pages were last updated. I think the value added by these assertions is negated by the fact that it is so easy to forget to update them. We can consider putting them back in if we can figure out a way to automatically update them when the page really changes.

o Removed the references to JDK 1.4 in the installation instructions.

Touches the following files:

M build/site/DerbyBugGuidelines.html
M build/site/derby_charter.html

Attaching derby-5688-13-aa-updateStatusFile.diff. This updates the trunk STATUS file to record the approval of the 10.9.1.0 release. Committed at subversion revision 1353510.
Attaching derby-5688-14-aa-updateDOAP.diff. This adds 10.9.1.0 to the list of releases in Derby's DOAP rdf descriptor. Committed at subversion revision 1353521.
Checked in copy of 10.9.1.0 jars (for upgrade testing) at subversion revision 1353527.

Attaching derby-5688-15-aa-upgradeLogic.diff. This makes a number of changes to support upgrade from 10.9.1.0. Committed at subversion revision 1353578.

I have tested the upgrade suite with the following starting points:

10.1.3.1
10.8.2.2
10.9.1.0

Makes the following changes:

1) Add 10.9.1.0 to the master list of official releases in OldVersions.java.

2) Correct a bug in DD_Version which caused us to try to upgrade from 10.9 to 10.9.

3) Move creation of the new SYSCS_INVALIDATE_STORED_STATEMENTS procedure from the 10.9 upgrade logic to 10.10 upgrade logic.

Touches the following files:

M java/engine/org/apache/derby/impl/sql/catalog/DataDictionaryImpl.java
M java/engine/org/apache/derby/impl/sql/catalog/DD_Version.java
M java/testing/org/apache/derbyTesting/functionTests/tests/upgradeTests/OldVersions.java
Attaching derby-5688-16-aa-fixMD5links.diff. This removes spurious spaces in the links to MD5 checksums produced by the release notes transformer. Committed at subversion revision 1353718.

Attaching derby-5688-17-aa-updateNews.diff. This updates the News section of the Derby top level web page. Touches the following files:

M build/site/index.html
M src/documentation/content/xdocs/index.xml
10.9.1 has been out for a while now. Closing this issue and assigning to Rick.
